because they block everything thats not quicktime. because they're jerks.
you can use wget to download them if you give it a quicktime user agent string like "-U Quicktime/screwapple.0"
and then youd play it in totem or whatever video player you have
this just started like 3 days ago, but there's a patch in existence to make gstreamer identify as quicktime. it hasnt been merged anywhere yet though
